entities.name: NVIDIA CORPORATION
entities.description: NVIDIA Corporation is a multinational technology company incorporated in Delaware and based in Santa Clara, California. It designs graphics processing units (GPUs) for the gaming and professional markets, as well as system on a chip units (SoCs) for the mobile computing and automotive market.

entities.name: SUBSIDIARIES
entities.description: Subsidiaries of NVIDIA Corporation involved in various aspects of its business operations.

relationships.relationship_description: NVIDIA Corporation has multiple subsidiaries involved in various aspects of its business operations.
